name: Jihosoft Android Manager
short_description:
Jihosoft Android Manager is an easy-to-use Android smartphone management software developed to help users to manage, transfer, backup & restore, and print Android data from computer. With this powerful Android File Manager, you are able to manage your Android contacts, text messages, all history, photos, videos, music, and apps with ease. 

One Simple Click to Backup & Restore Android Data on PC 
- Jihosoft Android Manager provides an simple way to keep your Android data safe. You can transfer & backup all your contacts, SMS messages, call logs, photos, videos, music, and apps to computer with 100% quality kept. 
- Jihosoft Android Manager also makes it ease to restore Android device from previous backup. You can select the files you need and instantly restore them to Android phone or tablet with one click.
summary: One-stop Solution to Manager Data on Android from PC
